config.section.Content.name: Content
config.section.Content.description: Alters the content active in the mod. Please make sure these are configured properly!
config.section.Appearance.name: Appearance
config.section.Appearance.description: Alters the visuals active in the mod. Please make sure these are configured properly!
config.TalkingHeads.description: Don't know why you'd turn off the main appeal of version 2.0 but you're free to turn off animated higher definition portraits.
config.Portrait.description: This toggles between the portrait art. 'Use Custom' will turn off all portrait changes.
config.Spicier Content.description: Mild is rated-E for everyone. Medium has IMPLICATIONS. Hot is Rated-R.
Gifts.Loved: Oh?$1#$b#Am I that easy to please?$8
Gifts.Disliked: I suppose I could practice my magic on this...$6
Gifts.Hated: I'm afraid this doesn't suit me.$6
Gifts.Neutral: Perhaps I'll find a way to make use of this.$6
Base.GiftReactionCategory_-7: Oh? Come to expand my already extensive culinary palate?$8#$b#I jest, thank you for this.$1
GiftStardropTea: Oh this is--quite interesting, embued with magic!$1
GiftBDPos: Ah, a gift for yet another rotation around our star? I appreciate this.$7
GiftBDNeg: A gift for my birthday? I'm afraid I can't except this. I hope you understand.$6
Gift907: Ah, I was starting to feel famished.$1#$b#Thank you for the tropical curry.$4
Gift218: Is.. is that Tom Kha?$9#$b#I haven't had it in a long time, thank you for your efforts.$1#$b#It reminds me of home.$1
danceRejection_0: Ah I'm... terribly sorry, I'm not quite used to the village and I don't remember how to dance.$8
danceRejection_1: Maybe next time, I'm still getting used to my bearings here in the valley.$8
danceRejection_2: Maybe you could ask someone else...?$8#$b#I hardly believe I'm a fitting partner.$1
danceRejection_3: Apologies, I don't quite understand the steps.$6
MovieInvitation_0: Ah, a movie? I would love to.$1
breakup_0: ...I thought that we would bask in each other's presence, but I guess I was wrong.$5#$action {0}Message "Lance is ignoring you."
breakup_1: I'm not going to say I understand, because I truly don't.$5#$action {0}Message "Lance is ignoring you."
breakup_2: This is... a stronger blow to me than any adventure I've been on, sorry... I'll need some time.$5#$action {0}Message "Lance is ignoring you."
breakup_3: I guess I was wrong about you, I guess Magnus was right after all...$5#$action {0}Message "Lance is ignoring you."
divorce_0: ...I truly thought that we would bask in eternity with each other...$5#$action {0}Message "Lance is ignoring you."
divorce_1: I'm not quite sure what else I could've done to fix this, if it was even me...$5#$action {0}Message "Lance is ignoring you."
divorce_2: I feel... lied to about our future together, I need some time alone.$5#$action {0}Message "Lance is ignoring you."
divorce_3: I truly thought you were the one for me, I guess I was wrong and Magnus was right... again...$5#$action {0}Message "Lance is ignoring you."
dumped_0: It truly is fascinating to see the mundane get overwhelmed by a power trip. Call me surprised, I thought you'd be different.$5#$action {0}Message "Lance is ignoring you."
dumped_1: I'm not going to apologize for who I am as a person, I understand who I am.$5#$action {0}Message "Lance is ignoring you."
dumped_2: ...Another fling, I guess...$6#$action {0}Message "Lance is ignoring you."
dumped_3: I don't think I can recover from a blow like this for awhile, I need time to myself.$5#$action {0}Message "Lance is ignoring you."

secondchance: If it is truly... what you want... I'm willing to give it a second chance.$6
Resort_0: It's finally time for a vacation.$3
Resort_Bar_0: Ah I do love a good pina colada!$3
Resort_Chair_0: Ministry affairs are not my concern today, I'm finally relaxing.$7
Resort_Dance_0: To bask in the warm sun is one of my favorite things to do. Does that make me a feline?$8
Resort_Entering_0: I can't wait to enjoy myself!$1
Resort_Leaving_0: It's a shame... but work calls.$6
Resort_Shore_0: Be careful not to cut yourself on seashells, they're quite sharp.$8
Resort_Wander_0: I wonder what other things are around the island now that I have time to look.$8
GreenRain_0: ...The villagers are hiding in the saloon?$8#$b#The mundane are scared of the most random things.$1
GreenRain_1: Green rain isn't harmful at all, it's actually a boon to the lands.$1
GreenRain_2: I think I'll fill some casks to bring to Magnus later, he always bothers me for these physical tasks.$6
GreenRain_3: I don't quite enjoy the fiddleheads that come during this time, but at least Magnus will like them.$6
GreenRainFinished_0: ...And as quickly as it came, it is gone.$6
GreenRainFinished_1: My casks to Magnus proved fruitful, he offered my guild a hefty seventy percent off our potion purchases.$1
GreenRainFinished_2: I quite enjoyed myself, reading books is a smaller hobby of mine.$1
GreenRainFinished_3: Did you find anything useful during the rains?$1
MarriedWizardCharacterDialogue_0: Congratulations, Magnus is quite estranged, but at least he has heart.
RoommatesKrobusCharacterDialogue_0: A shadowperson! How intriguing, I do hope to meet them and talk about such matters someday.
Marry.Patio_Mon_0: #$action {0}Message "Lance is humming."$b#A hopeless romantic all my life~#$b#Surrounded by couples all the time.#$b#I guess I should take it as a sign~
Marry.Patio_Mon_1: Oh don't mind me, I'm admiring the view.#$e#What view? Well, you, of course.
Marry.Patio_Mon_2: #$action {0}Message "Lance is singing to himself."$e#You can turn away from the light.#$e#You even outburn my sun, my star.#$e#You're the perfect subject with the whole world in your sad eyes.#$e#My saviour, my beautiful soul, I don't believe you're a liar.#$e#When our darknesses overlap, let me take it all away.#$e#Ruler of my heart~#$e#Ruler of my heart, ruler of my heart.You are forever beautiful~
Marry.Patio_Mon_3: #$action {0}Message "Lance is singing to himself."$e#Never thought I'd try this hard.#$b#Never thought I'd be hooked this much.#$b#Never thought it would get this much worse.#$b#I shouldn't give a flying damn about it.#$b#I have absolutely nothing to do with it.#$b#Never thought I'd care this much about it. Me, the one who is getting dumber by the day, what should I do, what should I do~
Marry.Patio_Tue_0: My singing?#$b#I... I heard somewhere that conversing with plants help them grow...#$b#Was my singing too distracting?#$b#No? I sing well?#$b#Thank you, my love, I guess I'll continue my endeavors.
Marry.Rain_Mon_0: Hmm. What should I cook tonight...#$e#I'm feeling something spicy, again.#$e#I'll simmer it down with milk, I promise.#$e#See? I didn't make it too spicy.[218]
Marry.Rain_Mon_1: Well hello, might I interest you in my latest concoction?[215]#$e#I assure you, I used sweeter peppers this time.
Marry.Rain_Mon_2: I'm contemplating bothering Magnus.#$b#Today is feeling like a slow day for me, my love.#$e#I need something to spice up the day, don't I?#$e#Maybe you'll get a kick out of something I whipped up on the fly.[225]
Marry.Rain_Mon_3: #$action {0}Message "Lance is singing to himself."$e#Uncertain voices are weaving deep inside.#$e#Compensate your feelings, circulate.#$e#Beyond the spiral you can reach for a helping hand.#$e#Just keep moving forward, moving forward.#$e#Pursuing the wish to be stronger than anyone, even if your destiny fails into the shadows, the pitch-black bottom of the night.Deep inside this endless maze~
Marry.Rain_Tue_0: Magnus chastized me for my prank the other day.#$e#My hair might be a little out of place.#$e#He threw a potion at my face.#$e#I threw a fireball back.#$e#Sometimes I can't help myself but act like a child in front of him.
Marry.Rain_Tue_1: Would you be interested in a lazy day, today?#$e#I just felt like curling up and reading a book, is all.#$e#You're welcome to join me, I always enjoy your company.
Marry.Rain_Tue_2: Is there any way I could pursuade you to stay with me indoors today?#$e#We could find something to do.
Marry.Rain_Tue_3: The... rain... makes... me... sleep..y...#$action {0}Message "Lance is dozing off."
Marry.Rain_Wed_0: The light pitter patter of rainfall makes me fall asleep easily.#$e#It reminds me of the calmer days of my youth.
Marry.Rain_Wed_1: If you're interested in keeping me company, I can fish out the blankets from the closet and we can read together.
Marry.Rain_Wed_2: I'm sure we can find something to do inside if you don't mind keeping me company.
Marry.Rain.Night_Mon_0: Ah, my love, you're soaking wet.#$b#Come, I'll dry your hair with some magic.
Marry.Rain.Night_Mon_1: I've drawn a bath for you to warm yourself up, my love.#$b#Sometimes I wish you would keep me company for longer on these rainy nights.
Marry.Rain.Night_Mon_2: I assume the weather is quite bad, considering you're soaked through.#$b#Come, I have a bath ready and it seems like you're in the mood for some pampering.
Marry.Rain.Night_Mon_3: Back from your errands?#$b#Come here, I'll warm you up and dry your hair with some magic.
Marry.Rain.Night_Tue_0: Would you like some tea, my love?#$b#It is quite dreadful outside, here.[614]
Marry.Rain.Night_Tue_1: I was wondering when you'd come back home.#$b#Let's get you dried off and settle in for the night.
Marry.Rain.Night_Tue_2: I'm quite ready to wind down, the Ministry seems to think that I have nothing better to do.
Marry.Rain.Night_Tue_3: I do enjoy coming home to your company and warmth, my love.#$b#Shall we wind down for the night in each other's company?
Marry.Rain.Night_Wed_0: I have a few last minute things to attend to, it should only be a moment, my love.#$action {0}Message "Lance is shuffling paperwork."#$e#And with that... I should be done for the rest of the night.#$b#I apologize for keeping you waiting, my love.#$b#Let's wind down together.
Marry.Rain.Night_Wed_1: Any good tidings today?#$b#I've thankfully had an uneventful day, unless you consider the Ministry dogging me a busy day.
Marry.Rain.Night_Wed_2: Shall we head to bed soon?#$b#We can just call it an early night unless you had more interesting things in mind.
Marry.Rain.Night_Wed_3: A long day to enjoy the comfort of my ${husband^wife^love}$, what else could a man ask for?#$e#All I wish to do is to hold you throughout the day, but we know work wouldn't get done.
Marry.spring_Mon_0: Spring!#$b#I do love how everything feels and smells fresh.
Marry.spring_Mon_1: As useless as I may feel with crops, do not hesitate to ask me to help with anything else around the farm, my love.
Marry.spring_Mon_2: The fresh flush from the cold winter is finally here, I feel like I can breathe without the chill.
Marry.spring_Mon_3: I should check on the wines I've stowed away in my secret hideout, they should be ready by now.
Marry.spring_Tue_0: My research on monsters never really ceases, but something about spring makes it a lighter load.
Marry.spring_Tue_1: I'm contemplating a nap under the cherry tree, care to join me, my love?
Marry.spring_Tue_2: Hello, my love.#$b#How goes your training with Magnus?#$b#If I were to ask you a question about circuits, would you know?#$e#Don't worry, my love. I'm not cruel, I used to fall sleep during his lectures as well.
Marry.spring_Tue_3: I never quite tire of watching you go about your daily routine.
Marry.spring_Wed_0: If you're ever interested in my research, you're free to riffle through my stuff.
Marry.spring_Wed_1: My... song choices?#$b#Ah!#$b#Yes, I tend to listen to the radio when I'm suffering the mundane paperwork.
Marry.spring_Wed_2: Care for a midday trist, my love?#$b#I jest--unless...
Marry.spring_Wed_3: Mushroom specimens from the mines are very interesting.#$b#I'll have you know, I've been interested in mycology since I was a child!
Marry.summer_Mon_0: Summer is where my magic hits its peak, call it the fire, but that's just how I am.
Marry.summer_Mon_1: The heat of summer is a silent killer, do be wary to not work yourself to exhaustion.
Marry.summer_Mon_2: Care for something cold, my love? I dug these out of the fridge.[233]
Marry.summer_Mon_3: I happened upon these when visiting the resort, I just wanted to share with you, my love.[265]
Marry.summer_Tue_0: Do be mindful to keep yourself hydrated, my love, I wouldn't want to have to warp you straight to Harvey.
Marry.summer_Tue_1: Spicy food always helps beat the summer heat.#$b#That doesn't make sense?#$b#I guess you'll have to try my bibim guksu.
Marry.summer_Tue_2: Hmm? Am I alright?#$b#What brought this up?#$b#Oh, my time during that rainy night?#$b#Yes, I still have my lower days, but Harvey has been working well with me on my... what was it?#$b#Oh right, he called it 'post traumatic stress disorder'.#$b#Thank you for caring, my love.
Marry.summer_Tue_3: #$action {0}Message "Lance is singing."$b#Stop, drop, and drag me into place. Lock the fire escapes.#$b#I'll break your pretty face.#$e#Oh you clever little things, the sycophantic teens, what a precious basket case.#$b#Now shut your dirty mouth, if I could burn this town, I wouldn't hesitate.
Marry.summer_Wed_0: #$action {0}Message "Lance is singing."$e#You're in my head~#$b#I had plans for the weekend, but wound up with you instead.#$b#Back here again, got me deep in my feelings, when I should be in your bed.#$b#You and I go back to like '09 it's like forever.#$b#And you were there my lonely nights, yeah keeping me together.#$b#So wouldn't it make sense if I was yours and you could call me your baby?#$b#But we say we're just--
Marry.summer_Wed_1: #$action {0}Message "Lance is singing."$e#Weight of the world on your shoulders.#$b#I kiss your waist and ease your mind.#$b#I must be favored to know ya~#$b#I take my hands and trace your lines.#$b#It's the way that we can ride~#$b#You wrap around me and you give me life.#$b#And that's why night after night~#$b#I'll be loving you right~
Marry.summer_Wed_2: #$action {0}Message "Lance is singing."$e#Don't you love it? Don't you love it?#$b#No I ain't happy yet, but I'm way less sad.#$b#Living sucks, but it's sucking just a little now.#$b#And I don't wanna cry no more, so I set my bar real low.#$b#I'm a-okay, you say it but you just don't mean it~#$b#Shut up and just enjoy this feeling.
Marry.fall_Mon_0: Autumn always brings about a crisp feeling. A nice cup of tea sounds good.
Marry.fall_Mon_1: Please do not barrage me with the holiday music just yet, I still have a season left to enjoy myself.
Marry.fall_Mon_2: Are you excited for Spirit's Eve?
Marry.fall_Mon_3: A nice cup of chai tea sounds great, let me know if you need my help with anything, my love.
Marry.fall_Tue_0: Care to snuggle up for the day and put aside our work?#$b#I jest, but we can always make time after the busy day.
Marry.fall_Tue_1: Magnus doesn't show it, but he does enjoy setting up the Spirit's Eve maze every year.#$b#I guess he just likes to be remembered as a powerful wizard.
Marry.fall_Tue_2: Do you ever have the problem of time feeling like it's moving all too fast but too slow at the same time?#$b#As much as I wish to spend my days with you in our home, blissfully ignorant to the world around us, I must work.#$b#I pray today is one of those 'faster' time days.
Marry.fall_Tue_3: Marlon sometimes falls asleep mid-sentence.#$b#It reminds me of the times when Magnus would be lecturing me and fell asleep with his own words.
Marry.fall_Wed_0: Gil always has the most interesting stories, with Marlon taking the punchline right out of his mouth.#$b#They've been good to me since Magnus introduced me way back when.
Marry.fall_Wed_1: Fall is one of my most favorite seasons.#$b#Something in the air makes my magic feel ecstatic and I can't quite get myself to embrace the chill.
Marry.fall_Wed_2: What was it called again?#$b#'Crunchy leaf season'?#$b#That's exactly how I feel about it, pardon if you feel embarrassment of seeing your husband stomping around...
Marry.fall_Wed_3: Spirit's Eve is probably one of my favorite festivals so far.#$b#Not only do I get to exercise, helping Marlon and Magnus catching the monsters for display, but the costumes are quite entertaining.
Marry.fall_Thu_0: I never quite tire of watching you go about your daily routine.
Marry.fall_Thu_1: Mushroom specimens from the mines are very interesting.#$b#I'll have you know, I've been interested in mycology since I was a child!
Marry.winter_Mon_0: The chill has come.#$b#I wouldn't say no to staying indoors and just finding comfort in front of the fireplace with you, my love.
Marry.winter_Mon_1: This time of the year always makes me antsy, monsters don't really go into 'hibernation' and lakes are dangerous.
Marry.winter_Mon_2: If we get the chance, we could always visit the bathhouse to warm ourselves up.
Marry.winter_Mon_3: I always love the look on your face when the cold sets in, the soft flush of your cheeks make you feel more alive.
Marry.winter_Tue_0: #$action {0}Message "Lance is currently playing with fire."$e#Ah pardon me, my love, I was just getting a little too chilly and figured I could warm myself up.#$e#You want to snuggle?#$b#I'll never say no to that.
Marry.winter_Tue_1: Ah, at last, the time for reasonable excuse to snuggle has come at last.#$b#The field is hibernating, should we excuse ourselves to keep each other warm?
Marry.winter_Tue_2: While my magic is inherently 'paradoxical', I can still employ fire magicks.#$b#Care to bundle up together?
Marry.winter_Tue_3: Nothing beats a cold winter day, some spicy hot pot, and the love of my life.
Marry.winter_Wed_0: The winter chill makes your cheeks flush as you go about your daily routine, it's quite charming.#$b#Come here, let me warm you up.
Marry.winter_Wed_1: #$action {0}Message "Lance is singing."$e#I remember when, you used to be the talk of the town.#$b#Turn your love around, don't you turn me down.#$b#I can show you how~#$b#Turn your love around~
Marry.winter_Wed_2: I would say I prefer Winter over all other seasons, the quietness of the valley and the ability to bundle up gives me a sense of comfort.
Marry.winter_Wed_3: Leo asked if we could make snowmen together, so that's on the itinerary today.
Marry.Outdoor.spring_Mon_0: Oh, before you go about your day![232]#$b#I figured you'd want a snack.
Marry.Outdoor.spring_Mon_1: Before you leave, my love, I have breakfast for you.[201]#$b#I had plenty of time to whip it up before you woke.
Marry.Outdoor.spring_Mon_2: If you ever need help with the non-crop related chores, don't hesitate to ask.#$b#Would you like breakfast? It's simple this time.[211]
Marry.Outdoor.spring_Mon_3: If you're planning on heading out, I have something for you.[240]#$b#I attempted your recipe, hopefully it's similar?
Marry.Outdoor.spring_Tue_0: If you don't mind something spicy today, I have something special.[226]#$b#I just really wanted a 'wake up call', so to speak.
Marry.Outdoor.spring_Tue_1: Do let me know if you're feeling peckish, I don't have Ministry affairs to tend to today.#$e#Lunch? Sure, I had planned on having lunch with you if you weren't too busy.[218]#$action {0}Message "Lance and I had a nice time together!"
Marry.OneKid_Mon_0: I'm really excited about %kid1 and how their meridians are coming along.#$b#Hopefully Magnus isn't too bothered about another hellion on the loose.
Marry.OneKid_Mon_1: Magnus tells me he doesn't look forward to when %kid1 can learn magic.#$b#Something about how his hair still hasn't recovered from my escapades of thinking he was a sweet potato in human form.#$e#Don't look at me like that, I love roasted sweet potatoes.
Marry.OneKid_Mon_2: Even if %kid1 doesn't wish to join the Ministry, we'll still be there every step of the way for them.#$b#I believe in us, and surely your love will be conveyed to them as well.
Marry.OneKid_Mon_3: When our child is old enough, we should travel the world together.
Marry.OneKid_Tue_0: I'll always wholeheartedly and unconditionally love our beautiful children.#$e#They will grow and change over the years and we will be with them at every step of the way.
Marry.TwoKids_Mon_0: Oh.. oh no..#$action {0}Message "Lance seems distracted."$e#Ah! My love...#$e##$action {0}Message "I ask what's wrong."#$e#Well... %kid1 and %kid2 are already being the little hellions I remember that I was as a child.#$b#And my new supply of potions was ransacked. I'm so...#$e#I'm so proud...#$e#I apologize, my love, it's bringing back memories of when I first met Magnus.#$b#I remember pouring out his entire cauldron just because it smelled edible.#$b#Call me sentimental, but seeing myself in our children finally made me feel like I'm a 'father'.
Marry.TwoKids_Mon_1: The children love the festivals, don't they?#$b#I've never been in one place long enough to enjoy the festivities, but I'm happy that we're together now.
Marry.TwoKids_Mon_2: I think %kid1 and %kid2 really think of Magnus as a grandfather...#$b#How do I tell them that he's not really... hmmm..#$action {0}Message "Lance is in quiet contemplation."$e#Maybe I should just ask Magnus to be their grandfather...?#$e#Would he be opposed...?
Marry.TwoKids_Mon_3: I have faith our children will adopt the best parts of both of us.
Marry.TwoKids_Tue_0: I'm thankful %kid1 and %kid2 get along well.
Marry.Bad_Mon_0: Sometimes I feel like I'm a ghost to you...
Marry.Bad_Mon_1: I destroyed expensive rare metals during a magical experiment.#$e#Such a terrible waste...
Marry.Bad_Mon_2: We're both out of the house so often, I rarely see you...${{27}}#$e#I know we both live busy lives, but we still need to find time with each other.
Marry.Bad_Mon_3: Could I be better? Can I do better? Ugh...
Marry.Bad_Tue_1: Do you ever get the feeling we rushed into this too quickly?...
Marry.Bad_Tue_3: I thought we promised each other we would talk things out if it got bad...
Marry.Good_Mon_0: My love, once again graces me with their presence, another day that I get to bask in your energy is another good day.#$e#Am I being overdramatic?#$e#I just find myself reminiscing over my adventuring days and thinking that this, this is surely bliss.
Marry.Good_Mon_1: #$action {0}Message "Lance is fiddling with magic."$e#Ah, my love!#$e#What was I doing?#$e#I was just... admiring the mermaid pendant you gave me...#$e#I still don't quite feel like this is real, and I guess I'm in awe of how you pursued me.#$e#Inevitable?#$e#My flirting??#$e#I--I... there wasn't really a way for me to stop this intangible pull to you, I guess.
Marry.Good_Mon_2: #$action {0}Message "I catch Lance making faces at the mirror."$e#Huh?#$b#I was thinking of my techniques.#$e#What techniques?#$e#You'll find out soon enough.
Marry.Good_Mon_3: #$action {0}Message "Lance is grumbling to himself."$e#I need new slacks.#$e#Should I cut down on the protein?#$e#But then I hate multiple trips for grocery bags.#$action {0}Message "Lance continues to argue with himself."
Marry.Good_Tue_0: #$action {0}Message "Lance is singing to himself."$e#We're so young boy, we ain't got nothin' to lose~#$e#Baby hold me cause I like the way you groove~
Marry.Good_Tue_1: But if I attach a warp there it would be noticable.#$e#But then I wouldn't need to use so much energy for Ginger Island patrol...#$e#Hmmm, I'll need to ask Camilla.#$action {0}Message "Lance is brooding to himself about something."
Marry.Good_Tue_2: Hmm. Mhm. Hhmmhm.#$action {0}Message "Lance is humming some pop song."$e#Hmmh! Mhhm, isn't that sweet, I guess so~#$e$#$action {0}Message "I think I know this song..."
Marry.Good_Tue_3: #$action {0}Message "Lance is fiddling with magic."$e#But it would definitely look spectacular with fireworks, no?#$e#A celebration must have fireworks...!#$action {0}Message "Lance is contemplating something."
Marry.Neutral_Mon_0: I'm not fond of watching TV or distracting myself with modern contraptions.#$e#I do however enjoy watching movies at the cinema.#$b#There's something intimate of being together in a dark room in our own world.
Marry.Neutral_Mon_1: Your Grandpa's shrine smells like magic.#$e#I wonder if that's the reason why you're so magically inclined.
Marry.Neutral_Mon_2: The saloon owner is so warm and welcoming. It makes one feel at home while enjoying good food and drink.#$b#I can see why his business is as successful as it is.#$e#I've been trying to go into town more lately.
Marry.Neutral_Mon_3: I need to visit my guild soon. I'm running low on mana elixirs.
Marry.Neutral_Tue_0: Do you ever wonder where we'll move to in the future?#$e#Maybe we'll purchase our own private island and live out our days there...
Marry.Neutral_Tue_1: The saloon has a fine seasonal selection of draft beer. Better than most taverns I've been to.
Marry.Neutral_Tue_2: If you're ever bored, I'm sure Magnus will have no problems lending out books to you.#$e#Given, you'll have to be careful of handling them.
Marry.Neutral_Tue_3: Magnus studies ancient fruit and I study monster crops...#$e#In a strange way, our work is somewhat similar.
Married.Dwarf_Scroll_I: Ah, have you happened upon a scroll from the mines?#$b#I hear they're scattered around everywhere.#$b#Hmm? Would you like help translating it? Don't worry, I'm well versed in dwarvish.
Married.Dwarf_Scroll_II: Oh, ready for round two?#$b#Do you remember anything from our last session?#$b#No?#$b#What am I to do with you?
Married.Dwarf_Scroll_III: Round three, yet you didn't remember the first lesson.#$b#I think you're just excited about listening to me speak dwarvish.#$b#I can whisper sweet nothings to you in most languages, you need but ask.
Married.Dwarf_Scroll_IV: Fourth time's the charm, huh?#$b#Are you sure you're not just throwing these at me because you've found multiples?#$b#I will not argue, I do enjoy reading over them in my spare time, thank you, my love.
Married.Ancient_Doll: What... is that?#$b#I don't think that's quite safe, my love, let me dispose of it for you.#$action {0}Message "Lance burned the doll..."
Married.Elvish_Jewelry: Oh lovely, I do enjoy how the elvish designs glisten in the sunlight.#$b#It's for me?#$b#Are you sure?#$b#I'll have to ask the dwarves if they can fashion anything for me in return, then. Thank you my love.
Married.Dinosaur_Egg: An egg... no... That's not quite right.#$e#A dinosaur egg??#$b#I didn't think those monsters in the mines could still reproduce..#$b#Fascinating! Thank you my love, I'll be sure to start up a new research project!
Married.Ancient_Sword: My collection of swords is quite expansive already, my love.#$b#I will accept, nonetheless.#$b#I assume Marlon will be pleased with another one of my 'magic sword' projects.
Married.Ancient_Seed: ...While I understand that this is quite rare and important, I feel as if you're poking fun at me.#$b#Would Magnus not have been a better recipient of this?#$b#Oh, you wanted me to use it as a tactic to talk to Magnus?#$b#I will not decline then...
Married.Dwarvish_Helm: #$action {0}Message "Lance is giggling."$e#My love, you cannot speak dwarvish just because you wear one of their helmets!#$b#It's for me?#$b#...I'm not quite sure why I would need one of these, but I suppose a passing gift to the Highlands dwarves wouldn't hurt.#$b#Thank you, my love, I'll be sure to tell them it was from you.
Married.Dwarf_Gadget: Oh a translator!#$b#These are the most recent version of it, it's quite fascinating to see the dwarves at work.#$b#Would you like to take a trip some time to speak to them some more?
Married.Golden_Mask: I know that you're enthusiastic about magic, my love, but that is not something to be toyed with.#$b#If you don't mind, I will take it to Magnus to have it handled.#$action {0}Message "Lance is talking to Magnus through communication magic."$e#Well yes, I mean @ brought it to my attention.#$e#I have not done anything worth scrutiny!#$e#Listen, I'll bring this to you later, Mag. It's not too serious.
Married.Golden_Relic: This one is at least a little less volatile than the last 'golden' object you brought me.#$b#I will not have to bother Magnus with this one.#$e#What does it do? Hmmm...#$b#That, I'm not quite sure of, my love, if you're truly curious, you can ask Magnus sometime.
Married.Wild_Horseradish: Ah what is it, the 'false wasabi'?#$b#I kid, but really, I would enjoy fresh wasabi every now and then, especially when you're so willing to bring me sushi dishes.
Married.Daffodil: Daffodil tea is quite refreshing, no?#$b#I see that you're having good tidings this season.#$b#I appreciate your small gestures, my love.
Married.Leek: Oh? Are we going to have something Asian-themed tonight?#$b#You know I do love anything from the East.
Married.Dandelion: Dandelions are considered weeds, but I truly do enjoy when they're dried and immersed in a good mead.#$b#Maybe that's just the adventurer in me, trying to find ways to enjoy myself among the wilderness.#$b#I appreciate your sentiments, my love.
Married.Parsnip: I do love your lunches, is this you trying to tell me you would like me to cook tonight?#$b#I don't have any qualms about cooking, just say the word and we'll have whatever you'd like.
Married.Cave_Carrot: While obtuse, cave carrots are quite rich in nutrients, especially when you're stuck underground for so long.#$b#I recall Magnus nagging at me after I got lost in a mineshaft for oever a week.
Married.Coconut: Coconuts are the best thing for summertime, are they not?#$b#Unless this is you telling me that you want me to cook my 'famous' Thai curry.#$e#Don't worry, my love, you can spice it however you wish.
Married.Cactus_Fruit: I recall being lost in the desert for several days.#$b#Magnus was not all too pleased with me coming back with my skin looking like a fresh lizard.#$b#I do not suggest drinking from these, my love, most of them have poisonous properties.#$b#Depending on the variety you've brought, though, I have no problem making licuado de nopal as a refreshment.
Married.Sap: Ah... were you concerned about my trips out to the Highlands?#$b#I assure you, my magic is quite rife with energy.
Married.Large_Egg: In the mood for some egg dishes today, my love?#$b#What will we have today?#$b#Omelete rice?#$b#Kimchi and eggs?#$b#Maybe just some marinated eggs as a side dish tonight?
Married.Egg: Oh? Lighter eggs today?#$b#Did you want to try my special mayak gyeran?
Married.Hay: Hay, is for horses.#$b#I kid, but I do not know why you would give me something like this, unless you're telling me you're going to ride your horse around the yard...?
Married.Milk: Milk today?#$b#Are we headed to the bathhouse?
Married.Large_Milk: Are you telling me you'd like a cream stew today?#$b#If you don't mind me taking up the vegetables, I will happily oblige.
Married.Green_Bean: I'm not quite a fan of green beans...#$b#I know that's childish for someone like me.#$e#It's just... the texture of it.#$b#Absolutely vile.
Married.Cauliflower: I'm not picky when it comes to floretes, whether it be broccoli or cauliflower.#$b#I am a bit of a fanatic about eating them with every meal, I agree.
Married.Potato: Hmm? Are you at a loss for what to cook tonight?#$b#Potatoes au gratin sounds quite nice tonight, doesn't it?
Married.Sugar: The fool's treat, is it?#$b#I try not to use too much of this in my recipes, but old habits die hard.
Married.Wheat_Flour: Hmmm? In the mood for some pasta tonight?#$b#What'll it be, my love?#$b#Although wheat flour is mainly used for Thai, so I assume you're wanting Pad Thai tonight?
Married.Oil: In the mood for some stir fry tonight?#$b#Maybe some fried rice?
Married.Garlic: You do know I love putting garlic into everything.#$b#I apologize if that means we must brush our teeth after the meal, but it's just worth it isn't it?
Married.Kale: I can't say I'm a fan of kale...#$b#Never quite sits with my stomach, it seems.
Married.Tea_Sapling: Oh? Interested in a bit of a tea ceremony today, are you?#$b#Although if you want me to dress ceremoniously, you'd have to follow suit.
Married.Rhubarb: It's quite fascinating how you manage to make pies out of such things like these.#$b#I appreciate all of your efforts nonetheless.
Married.Melon: Interested in my special sous vide melon recipe?#$b#It makes it dangerously delicious, you know?
Married.Tomato: Another ...produce... that I don't quite enjoy.#$b#Again, textures are everything to me and tomatoes are definitely one of those things that grates my nerves.#$b#I know, I know, childish. I can't help it.#$b#And no, I refuse to argue with Demetrius on the specifics of what a tomato actually is.
Married.Morel: Oh! In the mood for a mushroom dish tonight?#$b#I do love how these taste with almost anything.
Married.Blueberry: MMh?!#$b##$action {0}Message "I shoved blueberries in Lance's face."#$b#!!!#$b#While I do love all fruit *cough* you could at least give me a warning beforehand, my love.
Married.Fiddlehead_Fern: Fiddleheads?#$b#I'll be honest, I haven't eaten fiddleheads since my adoptive days with Magnus... and well, they weren't all too great...
Married.Hot_Pepper: In the mood for some spice today, my love?#$b#I'm going to assume you want tonight's dinner to be extra spicy today with this.
Married.Wheat: You'll have to excuse my poor focaccia, I only know a few recipes, but I will give it my best.
Married.Radish: Oooh? Would you like some radish kimchi today?#$b#It won't be fermented, unless you want me to use some magic on it.
Married.Red_Cabbage: I'll be honest, I can't really enjoy cabbage unless it has meat in it, and I know you're not keen on that.
Married.Starfruit: Sweet as honey, soft as cotton, and what was the last one?#$b#Ah, right, hopelessly hopeful?#$b#I do find the old tales of starfruits to be used as ceremonial wish offerings to be quite interesting.
Married.Corn: Are we making an artisan good today?#$b#No?#$b#Ah! Did you want me to think of something again today?#$b#Maybe some tamales then.
Married.Unmilled_Rice: Shall I throw this into the mill for you, my love?#$b#I assume it's because you'd want a rice dish tonight.
Married.Eggplant: Eggplants and eggs do go well together, don't they?#$b#Shall we have some as a side dish tonight?
Married.Artichoke: I do love a good paella, let me know if you catch any good shrimp to go along with it.
Married.Pumpkin: Pumpkin potage tonight, my love?#$b#Or would you want my famous stuffed pumpkin?
Married.Bok_Choy: I do love just throwing seafood into a pot with some bok choy, let me know if you don't want it as spicy as I usually make it.
Married.Yam: I could never tell the difference between sweet potatoes and yams...#$b#...They're different in color?#$b#....I see... I've always used them interchangeably, thank you for the information, my love.
Married.Chanterelle: Hmm.. sweet.. peppery.. maybe just a prad prik king today?#$b#...What's that? Ah, right, apologies, it's a style of fried rice, my love. I hope you look forward to tonight's dinner.
Married.Cranberries: I'll be honest, I only really have cranberries with alcohol.#$b#Call it an old adventuring habit of mine, something to warm the body on a cold night.
Married.Holly: Would you like to do some decorating around the house with these?#$b#...They're not mistletoe?#$b#Oh! To make medicines for my trips?#$b#Thank you my love, for always thinking of me.
Married.Beet: In the mood for a colorful dish tonight?#$b#I will try my best, but I'm not well versed in beets.
Married.Stone: Are you concerned about the Highlands being in such a dangerous area?#$b#I assure you, my magic torches and surrounding barrier is enough to keep those monsters at bay, I thank you though, I'll probably have some use for it at some point.
Married.Salmonberry: The first flush of the season, was it?#$b#I thank you for sharing your spoils with me, my love.
Married.Amaranth: ...Are you telling me that I need to lose weight?#$b#No?#$b#Anti-inflammatory?#$b#Oh I assure you, I'm fine on my trips, my love.#$b#I appreciate the sentiment though, maybe I'll pass these onto Magnus since he delves more into potions than I do.
Married.Pale_Ale: In the mood for a warmer evening tonight, my love?#$b#We can always enjoy ourselves in front of the fireplace and bask in each other's company.
Married.Hops: I do have a fondness for dryer alcohol, not really one to be interested in the ales that give me a 'mustache', so to speak.
Married.Void_Egg: ...I pray you simply purchased this from Krobus, Magnus has warned me of his ex-wife's random escapes and to be on the lookout.#$b#Although I'm unconcerned about her affecting us on the farm, it is still something to be wary about, my love.
Married.Mayonnaise: I do hope you remembered to not use lemons in it this time.#$b#I'm not too fond of the sweet and sour taste of western mayonnaise.
Married.Duck_Mayonnaise: A more, savoury mayonnaise?#$b#For me?#$b#Thank you, my love, you do know that I enjoy your sandwiches with a savoury sauce rather than the sweetened ones.
Married.Void_Mayonnaise: Interesting, very interesting.#$b#While I'm curious how this tastes, I think this would prove more useful as a ...no I'll surely be chastised by Camilla were I to use it on Magnus.#$b#I will stow this away for a rainy day, thank you my love.
Married.Copper_Bar: A copper bar?#$b#Are you interested in my magic sword collection?#$b#While copper may not be seen as one of the most versatile, it is still quite useful in holding in heat.#$b#I guess it's only good for people like me, who usually harness flame.
Married.Iron_Bar: Iron is definitely something that has more versatility than the other ores, I'll be sure to bring this to Marlon to see if we can fashion a new magic sword.#$b#Thank you, my love.
Married.Gold_Bar: Would you like me to fashion an accessory for you?#$b#While I may not be good with crops, flamework is my forte.#$b#I'll be sure to figure out something for you.
Married.Iridium_Bar: Iridium?!#$b#Are you sure you won't have a use for it, my love?#$b#...For a magic sword...?#$b#Yes... curious, I could definitely make a few more knives out of something like this.#$b#Thank you, my love, I'll be sure to ask Marlon if he has any ideas.
Married.Refined_Quartz: A refined quartz?#$b#Are you interested in how magic artifacts are used?#$b#We can have a lesson to ourselves without Magnus' prying eyes.
Married.Honey: Oh a decent sugar alternative!#$b#I will put this to good use in tonight's dinner if you so wished, my love.
Married.Pickles: Are you interested in how kimchi is made?#$b#It's quite a lengthy and messy process.#$b#We can always give it a go when we're not too busy.
Married.Beer: Heady beers are my least favorite, but I'll always take the chance to bask in its warmth with you, my love.#$b#Although you must be careful if you get me too drunk.
Married.Wine: I'm not fond of drinking wines on their own, but I do like their flavours in food.
Married.Juice: A non alcoholic drink tonight? I will try to pair this well with the dishes tonight.
Married.Basic_Fertilizer: ...I will take this as a sign that you are attempting to give me advice, but you know how inept I am at farmwork.#$b#I will hold onto this until you need it, however.#$e#I assume you're in need of it now?[368]
Married.Quality_Fertilizer: ...Now I know that you're just messing with me.#$b#Is this your attempt of telling me that you can teach me farming while I teach you magic?#$e#You know I have no need for it, so I will hand it back.[369]
Married.Basic_Retaining_Soil: I understand that I am versed in fire magic, but it does not mean that I will singe the entire farm, my love.#$b#I just don't bode well with farmwork.
Married.Quality_Retaining_Soil: ...I assure you, I will not burn down the farm, my love.
Married.Clam: Clams are very versatile, and I do enjoy a good clam chowder.
Married.Golden_Pumpkin: For me? Are you sure you do not wish to use it for some other project?#$b#I will try to make good use of this for trading purposes, thank you my love.
Married.Poppy: Poppies were the most common form of drugs in the east.#$b#It's a shame that they're seen as vile even though I do love poppy seed muffins.
Married.Spice_Berry: It's a shame that we don't have a mill for these spice berries, I do enjoy my wide variety of spices, as you know.
Married.Sea_Urchin: Oh? Urchins are one of my favorite types of sushi if you were so inclined for them tonight, I'll be sure to think of other dishes alongside it tonight, my love.
Married.Grape: I do know of the choking hazards of grapes for infants, I'd still like to implement the flavour in some way...#$b#Maybe just juices until they're of age.
Married.Spring_Onion: I'd have to say, it's a good thing you're not adverse to onions or garlic, we would be in a world of trouble with my cooking if you were.
Married.Strawberry: It's always a tossup whether strawberries are good when it comes from the store, but yours always tend to have the best flavour.#$b#I wonder if that's because of the farm, or that's just your skills.
Married.Sweet_Pea: They're a lovely smell, aren't they?#$b#I'll have to find a vase to put these in to ensure the farmhouse is kept to a comfortable degree.
Married.Common_Mushroom: Sauteed mushrooms are usually my go-to for side dishes, I guess you can call it a work habit from being around Magnus for so long.
Married.Wild_Plum: I still remember the recipe for some maesil ju if you're interested, these plums look good for a darker brew.
Married.Hazelnut: Hmmm... hazelnuts, I'm not too good with making deserts, so you would have to help me on that front, my love.
Married.Blackberry: Mulled blackberry wine is always nice on a winter's night, isn't it?#$b#Care to join me in front of a fire and enjoy this together?
Married.Winter_Root: I'm always unsure of what exactly a 'winter root' is.#$b#Magnus says they're a type of sweet potato but I'm skeptical...
Married.Crystal_Fruit: Beautiful, aren't they? I guess they're akin to other seasonal berries, but something about the ferocity of growing in winter makes them special.
Married.Snow_Yam: Ah, more yams? Would you want to just roast these over an open fire?#$b#I have no qualms if you'd like to enjoy a snack with me.#$e#Here, my love, I've toasted it.[208]
Married.Sweet_Gem_Berry: A... what is that?#$b#A sweet gem berry?#$b#Rare seed?#$b#Oh! From my seed pouch!#$b#I see you've managed to properly flourish it.#$b#I have no actual use for it, the Ministry simply wanted to know how Magnus was doing at the time and thought that I would beg for his mercy about seeds.#$b#I will give this back to you, you have a much better use for it than I will, my love.[417]
Married.Rice: Ah tried and true, I cannot escape my heritage.#$b#I hope you don't mind my incessant need to have rice with all of my meals.#$b#Thank you for thinking of me, my love.
Married.TomYueaPhai: Oh! A traditional Thai dish, my love?#$b#Something feels off about this one though--#$b#!!!#$b#Did you just feed me an aphrodesiac?#$b#Oh you're in trouble!
BETAS.Kissed_2: Ah...#$b#Your lessons with Magnus are paying off, I see.#$b#You have the innate ability to shake my meridians with your kisses.
BETAS.Kissed_3: #$action {0}Message "Your eyes connect after the kiss, and have a conversation of their own."
BETAS.Kissed_4: You leave me a man scorned!#$b#What ever shall I do with this wistfulness after just a single kiss?
BETAS.Kissed_5: Do stay safe on your travels, my love.#$b#You need but call out to me and I'll be able to find you.
BETAS.SPICY_0: I do enjoy your more aggressive kisses.#$b#You play with my restraint training.
BETAS.SPICY_1: Do that too many times and I might not let you leave the house today, my love.
BETAS.SPICY_2: You have me convinced!#$b#Leave tonight open, I have plans.
BETAS.SPICY_3: A kiss?#$b#After last night's activities?#$b#I must be doing something right, then.
BETAS.SPICY_4: I cannot help but feel that one lingered a little too long.#$b#I am quite open to a daylight rendezvous.
BETAS.SPICY_5: While your temptations gnaw at the door of my willpower, we have work to do.#$e#If you wish to push my buttons I will show you what happens.#$e#This is my final warning.#$e#Now, you're in trouble.#$v {{ModId}}_12HeartSPICY false false
BETAS.MODERATE_0: Your gentle kisses are competing for being my favorite against your more...#$b#Aggressive ones.
BETAS.MODERATE_1: !!!#$b#Did you just bite my lip?#$b#I'll show you a better way.
BETAS.MODERATE_2: Oh I know that look.#$b#What is it called? 'Core Memory Unlocked'?#$b#I feel like I finally understand what that means.
BETAS.MODERATE_3: I love the way you wake, disheveled and all.#$b#It tells me that I've sufficiently played my role as 'husband'.
BETAS.MODERATE_4: Your kisses make me finally understand why men start wars for their love.#$b#I promise I won't start a war.#$e#Not unless I have to.
BETAS.MODERATE_5: Oh but to leave me this early?#$b#Surely I can tempt you for just a few more minutes?
Books.0: An interesting array of books talking about Voidketh.#What is a Voidketh?
Books.1: 'How to manage your emotions.'#A self help book.
Books.2: A note was stashed in this book.#                    #Seems unreadable.
Books.3: 'Whilst this newfound portal is interesting to research, it seems that it is linked to a far away land.'#'I haven't been able to stabilize the portal but all of the senses can be felt.'#'The Ministry is sending my son back to the valley...'#'...Begrudgingly, I have yet to find a place to house him.'#'Maybe something can be arranged with a connective warp.'#Seems like these are missives from the wizard.
Books.4: 'Mag requested me back to the valley for this new portal research.'#'With both of our magicks, we could possibly stabilize it at a faster rate than him throwing random sigils at it.'#'It's still quite funny to watch the old man grumble and groan whenever I use a new sigil.'#Seems like this is a part of Lance's diary.
